line_1: And my Coz Tom, or his Coz Mary
line_2: (Who hold the Plough, or skim the Dairy)

line_1: White Gloves, and Linnen worthy Lady Mary!
line_2: You laugh, if Coat and Breeches strangely vary,

line_1: The drawing-room of fierce Queen Mary!
line_2: Sour visages, enough to scare ye,

line_1: In hopes to find or Nan or Mary;
line_2: In haste she trips it to the dairy,
